TopicTitle: How do I post an Imgur Album?

Articles.Content:
I saw, on other threads, there was a proper way to do it, but I didn't pay attention. Now I want to upload an Imgur album to a post, and have no clue how, nor do I want to go hunting through a bunch of threads where I might've seen how. Please help

Edited April 5, 2014 by Noname117
There's a thread from today on this very subject in this very forum: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75350-How-do-i-post-imgur-albums

Guess what didn't appear when I tried looking that up.

Thanks though

Guess what didn't appear when I tried looking that up.

Thanks though

Haha, it's okay. There's been a flood of EVA, decoupler, claw, and asteroid questions. The others are getting washed away.
Wait... is there something else I have to do? It is not working in the post preview

What exactly did you do? Assuming the last digits in the imgur album URL are abc123 then you just need to do this: [imgur

Javascript is disabled. View full album
]abc123[/[imgur]">Javascript is disabled. View full albumimgur]

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Ah, the brackets were spaced apart. thanks
No problem. The brackets were spaced apart in his example post because you need to do some trickery to have the properly formatted tags visible without actually applying
